name: Superior Room
description: Experience comfort and style in our Superior Room, equipped with AC, a refreshing shower, spacious double bed, TV entertainment, room service, and WiFi, all complemented by an attached bathroom for your convenience.

name: Imperial Suite
description: Indulge in luxury and comfort with our Deluxe Rooms, designed to elevate your stay to new heights. Featuring modern amenities and stylish furnishings, our Deluxe Rooms offer the perfect retreat for discerning travelers.
extra: Room With Free Cancellation | Breakfast only

name: Two-Bedroom Suite
description: A two-bedroom suite consists of two separate bedrooms, with private bathroom, with shared living room. This configuration is perfect for families or groups traveling together who want the privacy of individual bedrooms.
extra: Room With Free Cancellation | Breakfast only

name: Studio Room
description: Studio rooms are typically open-plan accommodations that combine living and sleeping areas into a single space. They are for individuals or couples looking for a compact yet comfortable living space.
extra: Room With Free Cancellation | Breakfast | Lunch | Dinner

name: Executive Room
description: Executive rooms are designed for business travelers and often include extra amenities such as a work desk, ergonomic chair, and access to business facilities like a meeting room or a business center.
extra: Room With Free Wifi | only Lunch

name: Family Room
description: Family rooms are spacious accommodations designed to accommodate families or groups traveling together. They may feature multiple beds or separate sleeping areas to provide privacy and comfort for each guest.
extra: Room With Free Wifi | Free Cancellation | Breakfast only
